text: The 1953 Round Australia Trial, officially the Redex Trial was the inaugural running of the Round Australia Trial. The rally took place between the 30th of August and the 13th of September 1953. The event covered 10,460 kilometres around Australia. It was won by Ken Tubman and John Marshall, driving a Peugeot 203. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left; font- size: 95%;" |- ! ! ! Entrant ! Drivers ! Car !
